texts.content: Oh no, Room Rick is already taken, but maybe the cubes are free! Go to the Cubes on the second floor.

Factory provides many co-working spaces and meeting rooms that you can book on the Factory app. One really cool concept are the “cubes”. They are small boxes where up to 6 people can sit together and discuss their project.
P.S.: If all cubes in the second floor are occupied, just use the Cubes in the third floor.
